attributes.action: make proper provision and if necessary, laws, to curb the vast bonus payments and poor practices of banking and big businesses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it has long been a source of disgust and dismay to most people that the poor business practices and ultimately the greed of money markets would lead to a meltdown in world finance. This needs the courage to be addressed and curbed, including hiking of housing prices in future, and vast bonus payments to those already well paid, at cost to us all.Free enterprise should not include the freedom to be bailed out at the expense of the general public and taxpayers.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps several already in existence:
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
